channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Seahawks' Win Over the 49ers
item.description: The Seattle Seahawks clinched the NFC West and No. 1 seed with a win over the 49ers. Here's what to take away.

item.description: See who's in and who's out for Week 18 of the NFL season.

item.title: 2025 NFL Division Winner Odds: 3 Titles to be Decided on Sunday of Week 18
item.description: Three division crowns will be decided on Sunday of Week 18. See the latest odds.

item.title: Braden Smith on his RECORD BREAKING Primetime Performance in No. 5 Purdue's Win Over Wisconsin
item.description: Purdue Boilermakers' Braden Smith broke the Big Ten all-time assists record in a tough win over the Wisconsin Badgers.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 Odds: 49ers Tumble After Week 18 Loss to Favored Seahawks
item.description: Saturday's loss to Seattle did a number on the Niners' Super Bowl odds. See the latest.

item.title: Smith sets Big Ten's assist record, eyes D1 mark
item.description: No. 5 Purdue guard Braden Smith became the Big Ten's career assists leader, passing Cassius Winston, in an 89-73 win over Wisconsin

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United, Liverpool tracking Watford winger Maamma
item.description: Manchester United and Liverpool have been tracking Watford winger Othmane Maamma. Transfer Talk has the latest.
